bio:
English man living in Paris -   After some intensive schooling and various professional experiences I still cannot categorise myself.   Big World Citizen, creator of Brand DNA, Digital Specialist and social animal! Love new technologies, Web 2.0, nature, plants, animals and MUSIC!   High On Life - Make It Happen!
